name: xfade_opencl

options.description:
Set one of possible transition effects.

custom

Select custom transition effect, the actual transition description will be picked from source and kernel options.

fade
wipeleft
wiperight
wipeup
wipedown
slideleft
slideright
slideup
slidedown

Default transition is fade.
options.name: transition

options.description: OpenCL program source file for custom transition.
options.name: source

options.description: Set name of kernel to use for custom transition from program source file.
options.name: kernel

options.description: Set time of start of transition relative to first video.
options.name: offset
